name: disenchanted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
no longer believing in the value of something, especially having learned of the problems with it: become disenchanted with Many voters have become disenchanted with the president.

no longer believing in the value of something, esp. after having learned of the faults that it has: I have become disenchanted with politics.
